question: I am so much worried about my husband , he is missing, he was out for work and has never come back yet, I am trying my best to locate him as I am so far from him, he is in diff. country for the job
answer:
QUESTION
I am so much worried about my husband, for about more than 12 days before, he was gone out for work and has never came back yet, I am trying my best to locate him as I am so far from him, he is in different country for the job, I am contacting everywhere, please recommend me something to read that he should come back soon, I don't know either he met any accident or any police case, but he is very humble man, I am very upset, please advise me something to read along with my efforts that he should return soon and contact me, and he should be safe and sound wherever he should be.Please recommend me something to read that he should come back or send me any email or call me or I get any info about him.
ANSWER


Share:
We deeply sympathise with you in your plight. May Allah Ta?ala grant you courage and may He bring your husband back back home safely, Aameen.

Our Imaan is on Taqdeer. The stronger this belief, the more courage you will have, Insha Allah. Also take strength from being patient and turning your gaze to Allah. There is no greater strength than that. We advise you recite the second Kalima, ?Ash-hadu anlaa ilaaha illallaahu wa ash-hadu anna muhammadan rasoolullah? as much as possible and also recite ?Yaa Mu?eedu? as much as possible.

If there is anything else we can do for you, please contact us.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
